item.description:
[b]"THE LARGEST & MOST ACTIVE SINGLES ORGANIZATION IN NEW ENGLAND WITH OVER 5,000 MEMBERS."

SATURDAY, NOVEMBER 27, at RAFFAEL’S at the SOUTH SHORE COUNTRY CLUB, 274 South St., Hingham. Exit 14 off Rte. 3 south; Rte. 228 toward Hull. wwww.raffaels.com.
Complimentary hors d’oeuvres 9-10.
Dancing with music by award-winning DJ from 8:30-12:00 AM.
FREE CHA CHA DANCE LESSONS 7:30-8:30
Complimentary hors d’oeuvres, free door prizes, and MATCH GAME prizes.
www.se-4u.com.
HUNDREDS OF SINGLES and couples, 35-65 years old.
Cost is $13 ALL NIGHT.
Proper business dress is required for men; sports jacket or dress shirt & tie at minimum; business or party finery for women.
Info, call (781)446-0234.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Pam at the door.
item.name: ":SINGLES WITH STYLE" SINGLES DANCE
